events.message: I was involved in a car collision on May 9th causing significant damage to my vehicle and I am filing a claim to cover the repairs needed.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the incident and involved damages to the vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact for all further communication regarding your auto accident claim.
We have received and acknowledged your claim submission. Our team will now begin reviewing the details of the case promptly.
Please provide the police report, repair estimates, and photos of the damage to your vehicle to help us proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including the police report and several repair quotes have been submitted for your auto accident claim review.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision and the extent of damages has officially begun.
Our investigation team has completed the review and confirmed the damages sustained and liability based on submitted evidence.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the cost estimates and the assessment of the vehicle damage.
The customer has reviewed the settlement proposal and provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the promptness of the process.
Your claim for the auto accident has been approved, confirming the settlement amount and moving towards payment issuance.
The settlement payment has been issued to cover the repairs on your vehicle as per the approved claim amount.
The claim has been officially closed following payment issuance and confirmation of receipt by the customer.
The details of this auto accident claim have been archived for record keeping and future reference if necessary.
